Quality Education.reason: mentions 'This course is a graduate-level class in Multinational Financial Management' and 'cultivating well-rounded professionals in international business and trade'.
evidence: This course is a graduate-level class in Multinational Financial Management.

The objective of this course is to enable students to understand the financial environment faced by multinational corporations—covering areas such as exchange rates, capital markets, and taxation—and to learn how to make effective financial decisions within this context.

The course is designed to support the broader educational goals of cultivating well-rounded professionals in international business and trade, as well as developing future senior managers for global enterprises.
